entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 6:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
